name: GAEA RS-4831 Abel
description:
The game right now has a game breaking bug, which will not allow you to move from the very beginning.. Stay in touch for further information.

a) Wait a lot when you press Start Game as our game is BIG.

b) When they mention a wire in the plant lab, pick the sphere up and connect it to the central tower structure in the room. (Sorry, we had placeholders we couldn't implement in time)
